name: "Riverdale" - The Pilot Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: On what date did Jason and Cheryl Blossom go on their boat ride?
questions.explanation:
July 4.

	The two were twins. It was just before dawn according to the voice over. A few hours later Cheryl was discovered on the rocks and Jason was missing. Cheryl was put on a police boat and helped search for Jason, but he wasn't found in Sweetwater River that day. Instead his body washed up weeks later with a gunshot wound in the head.

questions.text: In her first scene, who was Betty excited to see?
questions.explanation:
Archie.

	Betty was getting ready to see Archie in her first scene. Kevin was in her room, while she was dressed just in her bra. She hadn't seen him all summer.  Kevin was a gay character, and Archie was her friend, though she wanted to date him.

Pouring concrete.

	He worked all summer with his dad pouring concrete. He was just back to Riverdale before school was about to go into session.

questions.text: Where did Veronica and her mother live before moving to Riverdale?
questions.explanation:
New York.

	She was the opposite of Betty. She walked into the diner to order food and met Archie and Betty there. She compared herself and her new situation to the works of Truman Capote.

questions.text: What sport did Archie try out for?
questions.explanation:
Football.

	Before tryouts he had a varsity jacket, but no letter or anything else decorating it. The jacket was blue with yellow arms. His friends all thought he was set up to be a great player after his summer working out with concrete. Archie, a sophomore, was picked for the varsity team despite it normally only being for upper classmen.

questions.text: Archie tried to join a band as a writer.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Josie and the Pussycats, also comic book characters from the "Archie" comics, made an appearance as fellow Riverdale students. While he didn't try to join the band, later in the season they did play one of his original songs though.

questions.text: What was the name of the diner in Riverdale?
questions.explanation:
Pop's Chock'lit Shop.

	Pop's Chock'lit Shop was a staple in the comics and previous animated series. It was referenced early in the episode when Veronica and her mother first moved into town, and then shown in the first shot with Betty and Archie.

questions.text: Who was Archie with when he heard a gunshot the morning Jason Blossom went missing?
questions.explanation:
His music teacher.

	Archie and Mrs. Grundy. The flashback scenes show her picking him up while he was walking shirtless, and then later show then having a picnic and making out on July 4 near the river. They heard a gunshot but never told anyone because they couldn't explain why they were together.

questions.text: Betty and Veronica both tried out for the Rivervixens cheer squad.
questions.explanation:
True.

	During the tryouts they performed together and closed the tryout with a lesbian kiss. Cheryl Blossom told that that faux lesbian kisses hadn't been taboo wince 1994. Veronica was picked for the squad and Betty was told no. Veronica told Cheryl off and demanded that both be picked for the team or neither. She agreed and they both joined the team.

questions.text: What was in the "missing" bag that Hermione Lodge found in her apartment?
questions.explanation:
Cash.

	Her husband was on trial for embezzlement, which is what caused Hermione and Veronica to move to Riverdale in the first place. She hadn't actually lost a bag, but her husband sent a bag filled with cash. It wasn't explained how he had it sent while he was in a prison cell.
